alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 21 at 3:53AM CDT until May 21 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT /11 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM MDT /10 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MDT /9 AM CDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 35 will result in frost formation. For the second Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Dundy and Hitchcock Counties. * WHEN...For the first Frost Advisory, until 10 AM MDT /11 AM CDT/ this morning. For the second Frost Advisory, from 9 PM MDT /10 PM CDT/ this evening to 8 AM MDT /9 AM CDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
